content:
You're welcome! I think listing your Ugg boots for $120 is a fair price considering their condition and the fact that they're no longer waterproof. By including clear photos and a detailed description, you'll be able to attract potential buyers who are looking for a good deal on a pair of gently used Ugg boots.

Remember to also be prepared to answer any questions potential buyers may have, and be open to negotiations. Good communication is key to a successful sale.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your sale, and I hope you're able to find a buyer quickly!

Also, don't forget to keep an eye on your listing and respond to any messages or comments promptly. This will show potential buyers that you're active and interested in selling the boots.

Lastly, consider sharing your listing with friends and family, or posting it on other social media platforms to reach a wider audience. Good luck!
